attributes.action: Remove school uniform, allow student to wear what they want
attributes.additional_details:
Moreover, uniform is very expensive and it is unnecessary to buy students school uniform when they already have there own clothes.
Also, without uniform teachers wont have to check all students and punish thoes who are not wearing there uniform correctly, resulting in disruptions to lessons, causing loss of lesson time.
In conclusion, abolishing school uniform, allowing students to wear there own clothes, will benifit students grades, which inturn befinites the education appeal to other countrys
attributes.background:
If students could wear their own clothes,they would be more comfortable,potentially resulting in higher consentration, more effort put into their work,which leads to higher grades,less disruption in schools,and higher
qualifications,which makes the schools achieve higher in there ofstead report
